title: Padded
contents: text | Padded armor consists of quilted layers of cloth and batting.
property | Don | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Leather
contents: text | The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.
property | Don | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Studded leather
contents: text | Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.
property | Don | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Hide
contents: text | This crude armor consists of thick furs and pelts. It is commonly worn by barbarian tribes, evil humanoids, and other folk who lack access to the tools and materials needed to create better armor.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Chain shirt
contents: text | Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest protection to the wearer's upper body and allows the sound of the rings rubbing against one another to be muffled by outer layers.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Scale mail
contents: text | This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, much like the scales of a fish. The suit includes gauntlets.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Breastplate
contents: text | This armor consists of a fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather. Although it leaves the legs and arms relatively unprotected, this armor provides good protection for the wearer's vital organs while leaving the wearer relatively unencumbered.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.

title: Half plate
contents: text | Half plate consists of shaped metal plates that cover most of the wearer's body. It does not include leg protection beyond simple greaves that are attached with leather straps.
property | Don | 5 minutes — This is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 1 minute — This is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Ring mail
contents: text | This armor is leather armor with heavy rings sewn into it. The rings help reinforce the armor against blows from swords and axes. Ring mail is inferior to chain mail, and it's usually worn only by those who can't afford better armor.
property | Don | 10 minutesThis is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 5 minutesThis is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Chain mail
contents: text | Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.
property | Don | 10 minutesThis is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 5 minutesThis is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Heavy | Unless you have the required strength, your speed is reduced by 10 feet.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Splint
contents: text | This armor is made of narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a backing of leather that is worn over cloth padding. Flexible chain mail protects the joints.
property | Don | 10 minutesThis is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 5 minutesThis is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Heavy | Unless you have the required strength, your speed is reduced by 10 feet.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Plate
contents: text | Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.
property | Don | 10 minutesThis is the time it takes to put on armor. You benefit from the armor's AC only if you take the full time to don the suit of armor.
property | Doff | 5 minutesThis is the time it takes to take off armor. If you have help, reduce this time by half.
property | Heavy | Unless you have the required strength, your speed is reduced by 10 feet.
property | Cumbersome | You have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

title: Shield
contents: text | A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

title: Club
contents: property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.

title: Dagger
contents: property | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage.
property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.
property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
property | Range (20 / 60) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Greatclub
contents: property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.

title: Handaxe
contents: property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.
property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
property | Range (20 / 60) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

property | Range (30 / 120) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

property | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.

title: Quarterstaff
contents: property | Versatile | This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property-the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

title: Sickle
contents: property | Light | When you attack while dual wielding light weapons, you may use a bonus action to attack with your off hand.

title: Crossbow, light
contents: property | Ammunition | Each time you make a ranged attack with the weapon, use one piece of ammunition (loading requires a free hand). You can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search.
property | Loading | You can fire only one piece of ammunition from it regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.
property | Two Handed | This weapon requires two hands when you attack with it.
property | Range (80 / 320) | The first number is normal range and the second is the weapon's long range. Beyond normal range, you have disadvantage.

title: Alchemist's supplies
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Brewer's supplies
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Weaver's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Woodcarver's tools
contents: text | These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft.

title: Disguise kit
contents: text | This pouch of cosmetics, hair dye, and small props lets you create disguises that change your physical appearance. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to create a visual disguise.

title: Forgery kit
contents: text | This small box contains a variety of papers and parchments, pens and inks, seals and sealing wax, gold and silver leaf, and other supplies necessary to create convincing forgeries of physical documents. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to create a physical forgery of a document.

title: Herbalism kit
contents: text | This kit contains a variety of instruments such as clippers, mortar and pestle, and pouches and vials used by herbalists to create remedies and potions. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to identify or apply herbs. Also, proficiency with this kit is required to create antitoxin and potions of healing.

title: Navigator's tools
contents: text | This set of instruments is used for navigation at sea. Proficiency with navigator's tools lets you chart a ship's course and follow navigation charts. In addition, these tools allow you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability check you make to avoid getting lost at sea.

title: Poisoner's kit
contents: text | A poisoner's kit includes the vials, chemicals, and other equipment necessary for the creation of poisons. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to craft or use poisons.

title: Thieves' tools
contents: text | This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.
